articles.author: John Miller and Ludwig Burger, Reuters
articles.title: How worried should we be about links of blood clots to AstraZeneca's vaccine? - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Europe's drug regulator on Wednesday said it had found a possible link between AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine and very rare blood clots in adults who received the shot. Britain recommended people under 30 get an alternative COVID-19 vaccine if possible.
articles.content: ZURICH - Europe's drug regulator on Wednesday said it had found a possible link between AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine and very rare blood clots in adults who received the shot. Britain recommended p… [+4958 chars]

articles.author: Shoba Rao, Angira Bharadwaj, Ellen Ransley, Zoe Smith and Nadia Salemme
articles.title: AstraZeneca cut for under-50s due to blood clot fears - Chinchilla News
articles.description: The Government has made a dramatic change to the AstraZeneca rollout following a number of people getting fatal blood clots in Europe.
articles.content:
Scott Morrison is holding his second press conference of the day, announcing changes to the use of the AstraZeneca vaccine in Australia.

articles.author: Jonathan Keane
articles.title: From California to Brazil: Europe's privacy laws have created a recipe for the world - CNBC
articles.description: As Europe's sweeping GDPR laws approach their third anniversary, other jurisdictions around the world are taking cues from it to develop their own frameworks.
